monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2002-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 13.8°C and salinity of 35.7. Deep water measurements extend to 1699m depth.
2002-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 14.0°C and salinity of 35.1. Deep water measurements extend to 1899m depth.
2002-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 8.8°C and salinity of 35.2. Deep water measurements extend to 2366m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
